BreadcrumbDescription: Lilith is defeated. Lorath and I make for the old desert chapel to meet up with Neyrelle, who escaped with the soulstone containing Mephisto's essence.
BreadcrumbHeader: Meet Neyrelle at the Forsaken Chapel
Name: Promises
Phase0Description: Lilith is defeated. Lorath and I make for the old desert chapel to meet up with Neyrelle, who escaped with the soulstone containing Mephisto's essence.
Phase0OutsideSubzoneHeader: Meet Lorath and Neyrelle at the Forsaken Chapel
Phase14Description: We have no choice but to defend ourselves from the Knights Penitent.
Phase20Description: With the Knights Penitent dead at our feet, Lorath and I must make our plan to find Neyrelle and the soulstone.
Phase20OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Lorath outside the Forsaken Chapel
Phase31Description: I found no signs of Neyrelle in the chapel. She was never here. Heading outside to break the news to Lorath, I see Iosef and a small group of Knights Penitent approaching.
Phase31OutsideSubzoneHeader: Meet Lorath outside the Forsaken Chapel
Phase34Description: Iosef appears to be searching for Neyrelle and the soulstone. Surely the Cathedral of Light thinks all of us heretics now. Lorath seems to be out of patience.
Phase59OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Lorath at the Forsaken Chapel
Phase5Description: Lilith is defeated. Lorath and I make for the old desert chapel to meet up with Neyrelle, who escaped with the soulstone containing Mephisto's essence.
Phase5OutsideSubzoneHeader: Meet Lorath and Neyrelle at the Forsaken Chapel
Toast: Meet Neyrelle at the Forsaken Chapel
